input.sentences: it was a snowy cold day outside .
the weather had not gotten better in the last week .
there was a blizzard and it was rough outside .
the kids were inside all day and night and trying to keep busy .
we cooked family meals and talked throughout the evenings .
output.sentences: Today we had a cold snow day.
The weather called for snow all week.
The kids stayed indoors all day and all night.
We took this time share some fun family talks while we ate our meal.
